contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 22, 1946 D Blackpool Contest
Blackpool Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest
Test Piece Contest
Thanksgiving
South Pier, Blackpool, Lancashire
Prizes 1st £25 and silver rose bowl, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £5. Result as shown in Brass Band News October 1946. Correction in Brass Band News November 1946 shows Leeds 5th, Nelson 6th. 20 bands competed.
Aug. 13, 2011, 11:46 a.m. April 10, 2017, 8:31 a.m.
1 Stanley Newmarket Colliery Band Unknown
2 Houghton Main Colliery Unknown
3 Wigan & District Unknown
4 Bradford Victoria Unknown
5 Yorkshire Evening Post Band Unknown
6 Nelson Brass Band Unknown
